entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who was set free by Harry Potter. He is described as being over the moon about his freedom.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as looking very cross in deed.

relationships.description: Harry set Dobby free, which made Dobby extremely happy.
Hermione and Ron are mentioned together as part of the group going back to the castle.
